comment: BUT! 1.The sms is not delivered (I do not know if is it sent). 2.When call is activated, it displays on screen-bad step,because the thief can easily end a call even before it starts ringing on the another phone. 3.Application is unfunctional when screen is locked (even with swipe too). Refine these and it will be very helpful application! Correction: I reinstall the app,and sms is now delivered :-) . Other bugs stays.
